welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Itoshima, Japan - a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this picturesque city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iki Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Saga Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Saga Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
